queries.compiledQueryString:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (pr_id,requirement_id, work_item_id)
    pr_id,
    requirement_id,
    req_desc,
    work_item_id,
    work_item_description,
    milestone_id,
    milestone_description,
    merged_at,
    milestone_date
  from (select * from eind.pr_requirment_work_item2)
  where pr_id = ${inputs.prid}
  ORDER BY
    pr_id,
    requirement_id,
    work_item_id,
    merged_at DESC;
queries.inputQueryString:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (pr_id,requirement_id, work_item_id)
    pr_id,
    requirement_id,
    req_desc,
    work_item_id,
    work_item_description,
    milestone_id,
    milestone_description,
    merged_at,
    milestone_date
  from ${heatmap_data}
  where pr_id = ${inputs.prid}
  ORDER BY
    pr_id,
    requirement_id,
    work_item_id,
    merged_at DESC;

queries.compiledQueryString:
select distinct milestone_id,
  milestone_date,
  EXTRACT(MONTH FROM milestone_date) as mlst_month
  from eind.pr_requirment_work_item2
  order by milestone_date ASC
queries.inputQueryString:
select distinct milestone_id,
  milestone_date,
  EXTRACT(MONTH FROM milestone_date) as mlst_month
  from eind.pr_requirment_work_item2
  order by milestone_date ASC

queries.compiledQueryString:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (pr_id, requirement_id, work_item_id, milestone_id)
  pr_id AS yval,
  ${inputs.x_axis_requirment.value} AS xval,
  COUNT(${inputs.x_axis_requirment.value}) AS count
FROM (select * from eind.pr_requirment_work_item2)
WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM merged_at) = ${inputs.merged_month.value}
GROUP BY
  pr_id,
  requirement_id,
  work_item_id,
  milestone_id,
  ${inputs.x_axis_requirment.value}
ORDER BY
  pr_id,
  requirement_id,
  work_item_id,
  milestone_id,
  count DESC
LIMIT 2000;
queries.inputQueryString:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (pr_id, requirement_id, work_item_id, milestone_id)
  pr_id AS yval,
  ${inputs.x_axis_requirment.value} AS xval,
  COUNT(${inputs.x_axis_requirment.value}) AS count
FROM ${heatmap_data}
WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM merged_at) = ${inputs.merged_month.value}
GROUP BY
  pr_id,
  requirement_id,
  work_item_id,
  milestone_id,
  ${inputs.x_axis_requirment.value}
ORDER BY
  pr_id,
  requirement_id,
  work_item_id,
  milestone_id,
  count DESC
LIMIT 2000;

queries.compiledQueryString:
SELECT
  reader,
  single_sentence_summary,
  four_sentence_summary,
  paragraph_title,
  paragraph_content,
  base_year,
  revision_year,
  CAST(CAST(base_year AS INT) AS TEXT)  as base_check,
  CAST(CAST(revision_year AS INT) AS TEXT) as rev_check
  
  FROM (select * from csv.roadmap_revisions_role_based_summaries)
  Where split_part('${inputs.roadmap_years.value}', '/', 1)= base_check
  AND split_part('${inputs.roadmap_years.value}', '/', 2) = rev_check
  AND reader= '${inputs.readers.value}'
queries.inputQueryString:
SELECT
  reader,
  single_sentence_summary,
  four_sentence_summary,
  paragraph_title,
  paragraph_content,
  base_year,
  revision_year,
  CAST(CAST(base_year AS INT) AS TEXT)  as base_check,
  CAST(CAST(revision_year AS INT) AS TEXT) as rev_check
  
  FROM ${roadmap_revisions_summaries}
  Where split_part('${inputs.roadmap_years.value}', '/', 1)= base_check
  AND split_part('${inputs.roadmap_years.value}', '/', 2) = rev_check
  AND reader= '${inputs.readers.value}'

queries.compiledQueryString:
SELECT *
FROM (
  SELECT
    make_date(
      EXTRACT(YEAR FROM merged_at::date)::int,
      ((EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM merged_at::date)::int - 1) * 3) + 1,
      1
    ) AS quarter_start,
    broad_theme as roadmap_theme,
    COUNT(DISTINCT author) AS active_developers,
    COUNT(DISTINCT pr_id) AS prs_merged
    
  FROM (select * from eind2.code_file_summaries)
  GROUP BY 1, 2
) sub
WHERE sub.quarter_start > '1969-12-31'
ORDER BY sub.quarter_start;
queries.inputQueryString:
SELECT *
FROM (
  SELECT
    make_date(
      EXTRACT(YEAR FROM merged_at::date)::int,
      ((EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM merged_at::date)::int - 1) * 3) + 1,
      1
    ) AS quarter_start,
    broad_theme as roadmap_theme,
    COUNT(DISTINCT author) AS active_developers,
    COUNT(DISTINCT pr_id) AS prs_merged
    
  FROM ${newDimensions}
  GROUP BY 1, 2
) sub
WHERE sub.quarter_start > '1969-12-31'
ORDER BY sub.quarter_start;

queries.compiledQueryString:
WITH quarter_devs AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('quarter', merged_at)::date AS quarter_start,
    COUNT(DISTINCT author) AS active_developers
  FROM (select * from eind2.code_file_summaries)
  WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY 1
)

, quarter_themes AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('quarter', merged_at)::date AS quarter_start,
    broad_theme AS roadmap_theme,
    COUNT(DISTINCT pr_id) AS prs_merged
  FROM (select * from eind2.code_file_summaries)
  WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY 1, 2
)

SELECT
  qt.quarter_start,
  qt.roadmap_theme,
  qt.prs_merged,
  qd.active_developers
FROM quarter_themes qt
LEFT JOIN quarter_devs qd
  ON qt.quarter_start = qd.quarter_start
WHERE qt.quarter_start > DATE '1969-12-31'
ORDER BY qt.quarter_start, qt.roadmap_theme;
queries.inputQueryString:
WITH quarter_devs AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('quarter', merged_at)::date AS quarter_start,
    COUNT(DISTINCT author) AS active_developers
  FROM ${newDimensions}
  WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY 1
)

, quarter_themes AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('quarter', merged_at)::date AS quarter_start,
    broad_theme AS roadmap_theme,
    COUNT(DISTINCT pr_id) AS prs_merged
  FROM ${newDimensions}
  WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY 1, 2
)

SELECT
  qt.quarter_start,
  qt.roadmap_theme,
  qt.prs_merged,
  qd.active_developers
FROM quarter_themes qt
LEFT JOIN quarter_devs qd
  ON qt.quarter_start = qd.quarter_start
WHERE qt.quarter_start > DATE '1969-12-31'
ORDER BY qt.quarter_start, qt.roadmap_theme;

queries.compiledQueryString:
SELECT *
FROM (
 SELECT
   date_trunc('quarter', merged_at)::date AS quarter_start,
   COUNT(DISTINCT author) AS active_developers
 FROM (select * from eind2.code_file_summaries)
 WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
   AND author IS NOT NULL
 GROUP BY 1
) sub
WHERE sub.quarter_start > DATE '1969-12-31'
ORDER BY sub.quarter_start;
queries.inputQueryString:
SELECT *
FROM (
 SELECT
   date_trunc('quarter', merged_at)::date AS quarter_start,
   COUNT(DISTINCT author) AS active_developers
 FROM ${newDimensions}
 WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
   AND author IS NOT NULL
 GROUP BY 1
) sub
WHERE sub.quarter_start > DATE '1969-12-31'
ORDER BY sub.quarter_start;

queries.compiledQueryString:
SELECT
  "start" AS bob,
  "end"   AS fred,

  -- ISO-style strings (yyyy-mm-dd)
  LEFT(CAST("start" AS VARCHAR), 10) AS start_string,
  LEFT(CAST("end"   AS VARCHAR), 10) AS end_string,

  -- Date-typed columns (ISO)
  CAST("start" AS DATE) AS start_iso,
  CAST("end"   AS DATE) AS end_iso,

  -- Pretty strings (dd-mm-yyyy)
  strftime(CAST("start" AS DATE), '%d-%m-%Y') AS start_date,
  strftime(CAST("end"   AS DATE), '%d-%m-%Y') AS end_date
FROM csv.quater_data
WHERE "year" = ${parseInt(inputs.year.value, 10)}
AND "quarter" = ${parseInt(inputs.quarter.value, 10)};
queries.inputQueryString:
SELECT
  "start" AS bob,
  "end"   AS fred,

  -- ISO-style strings (yyyy-mm-dd)
  LEFT(CAST("start" AS VARCHAR), 10) AS start_string,
  LEFT(CAST("end"   AS VARCHAR), 10) AS end_string,

  -- Date-typed columns (ISO)
  CAST("start" AS DATE) AS start_iso,
  CAST("end"   AS DATE) AS end_iso,

  -- Pretty strings (dd-mm-yyyy)
  strftime(CAST("start" AS DATE), '%d-%m-%Y') AS start_date,
  strftime(CAST("end"   AS DATE), '%d-%m-%Y') AS end_date
FROM csv.quater_data
WHERE "year" = ${parseInt(inputs.year.value, 10)}
AND "quarter" = ${parseInt(inputs.quarter.value, 10)};

queries.inputQueryString: select * from pr_activity_technology_industry_category

queries.compiledQueryString:
SELECT
  make_date(
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM merged_at::date)::int,
    ((EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM merged_at::date)::int - 1) * 3) + 1,
    1
  ) AS quarter_start,
  COUNT(pr_id) AS label_count,
  COUNT(DISTINCT pr_id) AS pr_count
FROM (select * from pr_activity_technology_industry_category)
GROUP BY quarter_start
ORDER BY quarter_start;
queries.inputQueryString:
SELECT
  make_date(
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM merged_at::date)::int,
    ((EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM merged_at::date)::int - 1) * 3) + 1,
    1
  ) AS quarter_start,
  COUNT(pr_id) AS label_count,
  COUNT(DISTINCT pr_id) AS pr_count
FROM ${jumbotron}
GROUP BY quarter_start
ORDER BY quarter_start;

queries.compiledQueryString:
SELECT
  owner as programme,
  make_date(
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM merged_at::date)::int,
    ((EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM merged_at::date)::int - 1) * 3) + 1,
    1
  ) AS quarter_start,
  COUNT(pr_id) AS label_count,
  COUNT(DISTINCT pr_id) AS pr_count
FROM (select * from pr_activity_technology_industry_category)
GROUP BY quarter_start,programme
ORDER BY quarter_start;
queries.inputQueryString:
SELECT
  owner as programme,
  make_date(
    EXTRACT(YEAR FROM merged_at::date)::int,
    ((EXTRACT(QUARTER FROM merged_at::date)::int - 1) * 3) + 1,
    1
  ) AS quarter_start,
  COUNT(pr_id) AS label_count,
  COUNT(DISTINCT pr_id) AS pr_count
FROM ${jumbotron}
GROUP BY quarter_start,programme
ORDER BY quarter_start;

queries.compiledQueryString:
SELECT
  COUNT(pr_id) AS label_count,

FROM (select * from pr_activity_technology_industry_category)
WHERE merged_at >= DATE '${quater_start_end_dates[0].start_string}'
AND merged_at <=   DATE '${quater_start_end_dates[0].end_string }'

AND merged_at >= DATE '${quater_start_end_dates[0].start_string}'

queries.compiledQueryString:
SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('week', merged_at)::date AS week_start,
    ${inputs.label_type.value} AS label,
    COUNT(*) AS count              
  from (SELECT merged_at, activity, industrial, technology, owner
    from (select * from pr_activity_technology_industry_category)
    where ${inputs.pr_dimensions}
    AND merged_at >= DATE '${quater_start_end_dates[0].start_string}'
    AND merged_at <=   DATE '${quater_start_end_dates[0].end_string }')
    
  GROUP BY 1,2
  ORDER BY 1
queries.inputQueryString:
SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('week', merged_at)::date AS week_start,
    ${inputs.label_type.value} AS label,
    COUNT(*) AS count              
  from ${bar_chart_base_data2}
    
  GROUP BY 1,2
  ORDER BY 1
